actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.
Committee on Banking requested executive comment from Transportation Department, Securities and Exchange Commission, Commodity Futures Trading Commission.
Committee on Banking received executive comment from Commodity Futures Trading Commission.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill entitled the "Securities Fraud Prevention Act".

summary.text: Securities Fraud Prevention Act - Amends the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to authorize the Securities and Exchange Commission to deny trading privileges to a securities broker if such broker is subject to an order of the Commodity Futures Trading Commission denying, suspending, or revoking his registration under the Commodity Exchange Act.

titles.title: A bill entitled the "Securities Fraud Prevention Act".
